meanings.definition: Measures taken to prevent the accidental release of harmful biological agents.
meanings.sent1: Proper biosafeties in the laboratory ensure safety for all researchers.
meanings.sent2: The biosafeties at the hospital help protect patients from infections.
meanings.sent3: The biosafeties at the zoo made sure the animals didn't escape and cause chaos.
meanings.sent4: The biosafeties acted as a shield, guarding against any dangerous leaks.
meanings.sent5: Understanding biosafeties is crucial for maintaining a secure environment in labs.

meanings.definition: The state of being protected from exposure to biological hazards.
meanings.sent1: The workers wore special suits to maintain biosafeties in the contaminated area.
meanings.sent2: Living in a biosafety bubble can sometimes limit interactions but ensures safety.
meanings.sent3: The biosafeties at the picnic included bug spray to ward off any unwanted guests.
meanings.sent4: Her immune system acted as her natural biosafeties against common illnesses.
meanings.sent5: The biosafeties of the hazmat suit shielded him from the dangerous chemicals.
